Name: Morale Tablets
AttributesDescription: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to additionally reduce the Vibration Strength of the targets by a certain percentage when they trigger Counterattack within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.
ObtainedShowDescription: Allows a selected Resonator in the team to additionally reduce the Vibration Strength of the targets by a certain percentage when they trigger Counterattack within 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
